2024-02-03.name: Kui Cheng Shoufu Cong Youxi Kaishi
2024-02-03.desc:
A special reporter recently held an exclusive interview with Tenda Group President Pei Qian. Tenda Group's present capitalization exceeds $100 billion, and its operations span games, the Internet, digital devices, cultural media, catering, and other industries that have drastically altered people's lives. However, when questioned by reporters, Pei Qian stated, "I'm not a business wizard."My achievement is entirely due to chance! My initial goal was to simply lose 50,000 yuan. That's all..."

Source: Bilibili

2024-02-03.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Game: The Chronicles
2024-02-03.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! CARD GAME 25th anniversary special movie.

2024-02-04.name: Wonderful Precure!
2024-02-04.desc:
In the Animal Town where humans and animals live together, Iroha who loves animals is very close to her dog Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature GaruGaru goes berserk in her city. In order to protect Iroha, Komugi transforms into a human and even Precure…!? We have to protect such berserk animals! Let's join forces and return the animals to the Niko Garden!

Source: crunchyroll

2024-02-09.name: Dubu Wangu 2
2024-02-09.desc:
Ye Feng, a genius in alchemy, was plotted when he broke through the shackles of heaven and earth, and traveled 500 years later. In order to take revenge, Ye Feng embarked on the path of cultivation again, practicing hard and improving while exploring the mystery of the way of heaven. With his amazing hard work and talent, he became famous in Jiuzhou and traveled across the sky. Interpretation of a passionate legend of the Evil Emperor.

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-02-11.name: Ninja Kamui
2024-02-11.desc:
Joe Higan is a Nukenin – a former ninja who escaped his clan and is hiding from his violent past in rural America with his family. One night, he is ambushed by a team of assassins from his former organization who exact a bloody retribution on Joe and his family for betraying their ancient code. Rising from his seeming "death," Joe will re-emerge as his former self – Ninja Kamui – to avenge his family and friends. Kamui is a 21st century ninja, a shadowy anachronism who pits his ancient skills against high-tech weaponry with brutal finesse. He must face off against trained assassins, combat cyborgs, and rival ninjas to bring down the very clan that made him.

Source: Adult Swim

2024-02-18.name: Yishi Zhi Zun
2024-02-18.desc:
Meng Qi, a time-traveler who wants to be a dashing swordsman in white, fails in endless extreme missions in the 'reincarnation space'. The wind suddenly changed and he became the world-famous "Thunder Sword Mad Monk". However, all of this turned out to be the treacherous plan of the ancient power. Let’s look at the invincible and funny little monk who is happy in the world and proud of the three worlds.

Source: bilibili

2024-02-23.name: Bai Yao Pu Si Fu Pian
2024-02-23.desc:
The animation story of the fourth season of "Bai Yao Pu" tells the story that Taoyao takes the little monk Moya, the little fox demon Gungun and Taodu's old neighbor Liu Gongzi to continue to travel around in search of the missing Hundred Demon Spectrum, and encounters a dark knife on the way , Baizhi, Fengguo, Yuhu, Fengsheng, and Pengyu six monsters, the story of treating various intractable diseases for monsters.

source: bgm.tv/deepl.com

2024-02-23.name: Great Pretender: Razbliuto
2024-02-23.desc:
Presumed dead, master con artist and recovering amnesiac Dorothy is discovered by Shanghai Longu-bang, a mob who wants payback for her conning them. With no memories and nowhere to go, she must rely on a local crime underboss to elude Taipei’s criminal underworld all while tracking down leads to her mysterious past.

Source: crunchyroll

Note: The first four episodes were released in 25 US theaters on January 9 (subbed) & 10 (dubbed).

2024-02-28.name: Xixing Ji: Kuang Wang
2024-02-28.desc:
Youyu, a frail young Asura boy, developed amazing potential after witnessing the slaughter of his tribe, and was abducted by his ancestor Ji Ji. Youyu was reborn through the hell-like death torture of Zhuji, and developed the five senses of the God of Fighting and the unique way of fighting souls. After completing the death training, Youyu reunited with his friend Shigure, but Asura's law of the jungle persecuted Shigure to death. Realizing that being strong is the only way out, Youyu embarks on the road to becoming a king, determined to become the strongest and rewrite the rules of Asura!

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-02-29.name: Bu Xing Si: Yuan Qi
2024-02-29.desc:
Two young men in the shadow of aristocratic families yearn for the legendary fairyland Penglai. The Ganshi star passed by, and the sorcerers came to attack. The star stone cast the cauldron, awakening the power hidden deep in their bodies, and also awakening a desire they had never had before.

source: bgm.tv/deepl
